constituent: wealth, house, wealth, one, ceiling, mouth, rice field, brains
heisigStory: Here we have the original character on which the primitive element for wealth is based. In keeping with the story introduced back then, note how all the wealth is kept under the roof of the same house.
koohiiStory1: Remember Ducktales? That rich duck had that room in his house where he kept all the wealth! He had so much in that house you could even swim in it!
koohiiStory2: In ancient Japan, a RICE FIELD is a unit of wealth as it can produce enough to feed all the MOUTHs in ONE HOUSE.
myStory: giàu. nhà một miệng ăn mà có cả đồng
readingExamples: 富強 (ふきょう), 富裕 (ふゆう), 貧富 (ひんぷ), 富む (と.む), 富 (とみ)
words: to be rich, to become rich
